[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

src_text: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
ref_text: Sateliitiwaa mba pa-naalɛ, pa-taa paa ŋgʋ lɛ ki-yuŋ kaatalɩ ɛzɩ pawʋndɩnaa 1,000 mbʋ yɔ nɛ peseɣ ɛzɩ mayɩlɩnaa 17,500 paa ñɩɣyʋʋ ŋgʋ yɔ, pɔkɔm nɛ poyooni ɖama Tɛtʋ ñʋʋ yɔɔ ɛzɩ mayɩlɩnaa 491 mbʋ yɔ.
hyp_text: Tɩmɩyɛ tɛtʋ ndʋ ɩwɛ ɛyaa 1 000 tɛtʋ nɛ tɩ-yɔɔ pɩɣa nɛ ɛɖɔɔɔ tɩ-tɛ ɛyaa 17 500 miles kɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛɛ
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

src_text: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.

hyp_text: Kɩɩwɛɛ ɖɩ-hɔɔlʋʋ pɩɩsɩɣ ɛjaɖɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se India yɔ ɖɩ-ɖɩɩtʋ ndʋ pɩɩkɛ kɩɩlɩɩ tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se swine flu yɔ, pɩɩɩtʋ ndʋ ɖɩkɩɩɣ pɩɩkɛ ɛjaɖɛ ɖɩɩlɩɩ tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se India yɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

src_text: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.

prompt:

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

hyp_text: Tsunami pɩɣa kɛlɛ, nɛ pɩɣa yɔɔ yɔɔ yɔɔ, Jakarta seismology agency kɛlɛ ɛyaa se tsunami pɩɣa yɔɔ yɔɔ yɔɔ, nɛ ɛyaa se ɛnʋ kɩkɛ ɖɩ-tɛ tɔm pɩsɩna ɛzɩ 6.5 nɛɛlɛ.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

src_text: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

src_text: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.

hyp_text: Australia Mitchell Gourley pɛkɛɛ kɩlɛlɩɣ ŋgʋ tɛtʋ ñɩŋga nɔɔ nɛ ñɩmʋʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-tɛtʋ ñɩŋga tɩyɔɔdʋʋ tɛtʋ ñɩŋga tɩyɔɔdʋʋ tɛtʋ ñɩŋga. Czech Oldrich Jelinek pɛkɛɛ kɩlɛlɩɣ ŋgʋ tɛtʋ ñɩŋga nɔɔ nɛ ñɩmʋʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-tɛtʋ ñɩŋga tɩyɔɔdʋʋ tɛtʋ ñɩŋga.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

ref_text: Mɛ-ɛsɩndaa lɛ, pɩtaawɛɛnɩ tɔbʋʋ nɩʋ ; pɩtʋʋ fɛyɩ se pɩtaafɛyɩ siɣsiɣ
hyp_text: Pɛɛlɩɣ ɖɔɖɔ tʋmɩyɛ ndɩ yɔ, ɛkɛ nɛ ɛyaa nɔɔ yɔɔ pɩlɩɣ ɛyaa nɔɔ yɔɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.

hyp_text: Kɩtɛɛɛyɔɔzɩ nɛɛlɛɛzɩ kɩtɛɛɛyɔɔzɩ Chandra Shekhar Solanki nɛ ɛsɩzɩɣ nɛɛlɛɛzɩ kɩtɛɛɛyɔɔzɩ ɛzɩɩmɩyɛ yɔɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

ref_text: Filiipini ɛjaɖɛ taa polisi nɔɔyʋ mʋ Hɔŋkɔŋ agɔma nabɛyɛ mba pɔkɔma se pekilimi tɛtʋ taa yɔ pɔ-lɔɔɖɩyɛ nɛ ɖoŋ Filipiini tɛtʋ sɔsɔtʋ Maniiyi taa nɛ ɛkpa-wɛ nɛ ɛsɩɩ ɛ-cɔlɔ se pɛ-tɛ mba ɛhɛyɩ pʋcɔ nɛ eyebi-wɛ.
hyp_text: Pɩkpɛdɩ Filipini ɛyaa kɛdɩyɔ, ɛyaa kɛdɩ kɩbɩɣnaɣ kɛdɩdʋʋ tɛtʋ ɛɛwɛɛ Manilla nɛ tɩ-taa, Hong Kong kɛdɩdʋʋ tɛtʋ kɛdɩyɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Wɛɛ ŋgʋ kɩlɩɣ tʋmɩyɛ tɛtʋ ndʋ lɛ, ɛyaa ɛyaa ŋgʋ pɩkpɛdɩ ɖɩ-tɛtʋ nɛ pɩkpɛlɩkɩ ɛyaa ŋgʋ kɩlɩɣ Luna yɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: Princeton Sukuli Kɩtɛzʋʋ ŋgʋ kɩwɛ Etaazuuni nɛ Uppsala Sukuli Kɩtɛzʋʋ ŋgʋ kɩwɛ Suyɛɛdɩ yɔ pa-taa ñɩnɩyaa yɔɔdaa se sumaɣ kɩfalaɣ ŋga kalɩ kpanɖaŋ naalɛ ɖeke taa na, paa pamaɣzɩɣ se lɛɣzɩtʋ ndʋ tɩkpakɩɣ alɩwaatʋ sakɩyɛ nɛ pɩkpaɖɩ yɔ, pɩlɩɩnɩ tɛtʋ taa Darwin sumaɣ ŋga payaɣ se Geospiza fortes nɛ sumaɣ Geospiza conirostris ŋga kalɩnɩ ɖoli nɛ kɔkɔɔ peeɖe, palʋlʋʋ taa.
hyp_text: Pɩlɩzɩkɩ ñʋʋdʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se Princeton University nɛ Sʋwiizi tɛtʋ ñʋʋdʋ Uppsala University taa, pɩtɩŋga ɛyaa nɛ ndʋ ɛsɩndaɣ pɩlɩzɩkɩ ñʋʋdʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes nɛ pɩlɩzɩkɩ ñʋʋdʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris yɔ, nɛ ɛsɩndaɣ ɛyaa ndʋ pɩlɩzɩkɩ ñʋʋdʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se Geospiza fuliginosa yɔ, ɛɛtɔɔna ɛɛwɛɛ nɛ ɛɛwɛɛ pɩlɩzɩkɩ ñʋʋdʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ nɖɩ payaɣ se Geospiza fortis yɔ.

hyp_text: Pɩɩɩŋgɛɛ nɛ pɩɩɩŋgɛɛ miles waa ɩtɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩɩ
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Ñɛtɛɛ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa, ɛyaa pɩtɩkɩɣ nɛ pɩtɩkɩɣ nɛ ɛyaa nɔɔ ɛyaa kɩlɩɣ yɔɔ pɩɣa taa, ɛyaa kɩtɩɣnaɣ ɛyaa nɔɔ tɛtɛ nɛ ɛyaa kɩlɩɣ yɔɔ pɩɣa taa. Ocelots yɔɔɖɛɛ kɛɛɖɛɛ ɛyaa nɔɔ tɛtɛ nɛ ɛyaa kɩlɩɣ yɔɔ pɩɣa taa.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

hyp_text: Pɩtɛ tɔm ndʋ pɩkɛɣ pɩwɛɛɛ yɔɔ, ɛyaa ɛnɛ tɔm ndʋ ɛɖɩɣʋʋ ɛyaa ɛɛɖɛɛ ɛyaa tɛtʋ ndʋ tɩyɔɔ pɩwɛɛɛ yɔɔ.
prompt:

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

src_text: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Ñɩɣtʋndɛ nɛɛlɛɛdɩʋ kɛdɛɛdɩ yɔɔdʋʋ ɖɔɖɔ kɩkpɛndɩɣɛ ɛyaa ñɩɣtʋndɛ yɔɔdʋʋ nɛ ɛyaa Kɩlɩfɩnɔɔ yɔɔdʋʋ taa ɖɔɖɔ kɛdɛɛdɩ yɔɔdʋʋ ndɩɩ pɩtɛ lɛ, ɛyaa Kɩlɩfɩnɔɔ yɔɔdʋʋ taa kɛdɛɛdɩ yɔɔdʋʋ nɛɛlɛɛdɩʋ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: Ɖoŋ ɖoŋ lɛ, mba palɩzɩɣ déterminisme techologique tɔbʋʋ yɔ, pɛwɛnɩ lɩmaɣza sɔsɔna naalɛ : pamaɣzɩɣ se lɛɣtʋ ñɩnʋʋ nʋmɔʋ ɛlɩɣnɩ ɛyaa sɔnzɩ yaa politiki cɔlɔ na, nɛ lɛɣtʋ ñɩnʋʋ nʋmɔʋ wɛnɩ ɖoŋ ɛyaa samasɩ yɔɔ.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[Kabiyè]:

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

hyp_text: Kpaɣnɩ video kɩbɩnaɣ ŋga payaɣ se video recording yɔ, ɖɩɖʋɖʋ ɛjaɖɛ nɖɩ ɖɩ-taa se ɛjaɖɛ ɛɖʋɖʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ taa nɛ kɩbɩnaɣ tɩŋgʋ ndʋ ɖɩlɩɩna ɛyʋʋ kɛlɛɣtʋ taa yɔɔ yɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Ɖɩnaa tʋmɩyɛ tɩnaa taa lɛ, ɛsɩndɩɩnaa nɛ ndʋɛ yɔɔ nɛ ɛkɩlɩŋɩnaa nɛ ndʋɛ yɔɔ pɩkɛ tɔm susuu sɔsɔyɛ.
prompt:

prompt:

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

prompt:

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Pɩlɩɩzɩɣ yɔɔ tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ tɛtʋ ndʋ lɛ, pɩlɩɩzɩɣ yɔɔ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ tʋmɩyɛ tɩnɩɩnɩɣ tʋmɩyɛ kʋɖʋmɖɩyɛ kɛdɩyɛ tɩnɩɩnɩɣ tʋmɩyɛ kʋɖʋmɖɩyɛ kɛdɩyɛ yɔɔ kɩkpɛdɩsɩ tʋmɩyɛ tɩnɩɩnɩɣ tʋmɩyɛ kʋɖʋmɖɩyɛ kɛdɩyɛ yɔɔ tɩ-yɔɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Ɖɩɣa tɔm taa lɩmɩyɛ ɛnʋ ɖɔɖɔ, kɩwɛɛ ɛnʋ ɖɔɖɔ nɛ ɛnʋ ñɩɣtʋ ɖɔɖɔ tɩyɛ, pɩɣa ɖɔɖɔ ɛnʋ ɖɔɖɔ nɛ ɛnʋ ɖɔɖɔ pɩɣa ɛnʋ ɖɔɖɔ tɩyɛ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src_text: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

src_text: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src_text: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
ref_text: Nimasɩ tɩŋɩɩ Oyapock pɔyaɣ koŋdoloko yɔɔ. Pɩtɩŋ-na kɩyaɣ nɛ Oyapock nɛ Brazil nɛ Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock, French Guiana tɛtʋ papɩsɩ pɛkpɛŋdɩ.
hyp_text: Oyapock River Bridge tɛtɛɛ ndʋ tɩwɛ ŋgʋ ɛsɛɛnaɣ. Ɛnʋ ɖɔɖɔ ɛyaa kɛlɛmɩyaa Oyapock River nɛ ɛpɩsɩ Oiapoque nɛ Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock nʋmɔʋ taa.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.
