src_text: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
ref_text: Lɛɛlɛɛyɔ masɩ nzɩ paɖʋwa se pataase nɛ pɩcɛzɩ-sɩ yɔ, sɩtalɩ kajalaɣ ñɩnzɩ - ɖoŋ ɖoŋ lɛ kpaɣnɩ miiliwaa 35 piwolo 40 ñɩɣyʋʋ kʋɖʋmʋʋ taa (kilomɛtanaa 56 piwolo 64 ñɩɣyʋʋ kʋɖʋmʋʋ taa) - nɛ pɩkɛnɩ kɩjɛyʋʋ se pañam-sɩ.
hyp_text: Sɔsɔɔ mbʋ yɔ, pɩkpɛdɩzɩɣ nɛɛlɛ nɛɛlɛ ɛnʋ ɖɩ-yɔɔ nɛ pɩkpɛdɩzɩɣ ɛnʋ ɖɩɖɩɩ nɛɛlɛ ɛnʋ ɖɩ-yɔɔ nɛ pɩkpɛdɩzɩɣ nɛɛlɛ nɛɛlɛ ɛnʋ ɖɩ-yɔɔ, pɩkpɛdɩzɩɣ ɛnʋ ɖɩɖɩɩ nɛɛlɛ ɛnʋ ɖɩ-yɔɔ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

ref_text: Pɩwɛ piti se kaŋgalaafu tʋmɩyɛ ɖɔŋ camɩyɛ cɩnɛ nɛ pɩkpaɖɩ habɛɛ lɛɛna yɔɔ, ɛzɩ Pɛnɩsilivaanii Wilds taa mbʋ yɔ.
hyp_text: Pɛlɛɛzɩɩ, nɛ pɩlɩzɩɩ, ɛyaa pɩlɩzɩɩ mɔɔ kɛŋna wɛɛ mɔɔ kɛŋna ɛzɩ Pennsylvania Wilds nɛɛlɛ yɔ.

prompt:

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

src_text: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref_text: Jaavaa tɛtʋ taa tɔɔnasɩ nzɩ paɖʋ sɩ-taa sɔzɩŋ wondu ndɩ ndɩ yɔ, sɩtɔyɩ lɛɛlɛɛyɔ Ɛndonezii ɛjaɖɛ taa. Sɔzɩŋ wondu ndʋ tɩtɔyaa nɛ Jaavaa mba kɩlɩ sɔɔlʋʋ yɔ, ndʋ lɛ kɛtɛʋ, kpanzʋʋ, sikiɖi (kɔzɩ kɔzɩ Jaavaa mba anasaayɩ kpaakpa sikiɖi) nɛ sɔzɩŋ wondu ndɩ ndɩ lɛɛtʋ.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

prompt:

hyp_text: Paa ɛyʋ kɛlɩɣ tɛtʋ tɩyɛ nɛ ɛkɛlɩɣ tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkɛɣ tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkɛɣ tɛtʋ tɩyɛ nɛ pɛkpɛlɩkɩ ɛsɩba pɩkɛɣ tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkɛɣ tɛtʋ tɩyɛ.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: Pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ kɛɛɛ yɔɔ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ kɛɛɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ yɔɔ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ yɔɔ yɔɔ, pɩɩkɛ pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ nɛ ɛyaa mba pɩkpɛndɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔ

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.

src_text: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
ref_text: Yee iwobi kaɖaɣ ŋga pahayɩ ka-taa camɩyɛ yɔ, pakaɣ-mɩ kizinuu se ɩtaakpɛzɩ paa tɩʋ kʋɖʋmʋʋ, nɛ ɩɩkaɣ pʋ-yɔɔ tɔm hɔm.
hyp_text: Pɛlɛzɩɣɛɛ sɔsɔʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ tɔm tɔm taa, pɩkpɛdɩɣ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ tɩ-taa kɔyɔ, pɩkpɛdɩɣ sɔsɔʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ nɛ pɩkpɛdɩɣ sɔsɔʋ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ.

src_text: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Kabiyè]: Paa mbʋ yɔ, Pɛliziki nɛ Suwiisi ñɩma mba pɔyɔɔdʋʋ fransɩɩ yɔ, pɛkpɛlɩkɩ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ sukuli taa, ye mbʋ papɩzɩɣ nɛ panɩɩ mɩ-tɔm paa ɩlakɩnɩ tʋmɩyɛ fransɩɩ sɔsɔʋ kɩgalʋʋ kɔyɔ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Kabiyè]: Waasɩ wɛɛ nɛ sɩɖɛɣ lɛ, ɛyaa ma tendemee tɛtʋ ndʋ pɩkpɛdɩsɩ-tʋ nɛ tɩwɛɛ culaaa yɔ tɩ-yɔɔ nɛ piwolo pɩtalɩ teŋgu nɔɔ yɔɔ kajalanzɩ.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Kabiyè]: Sanzɩ baril waa kudokiŋ sakɩyɛ kpɛdɩ Fairbanks hadɛ kiŋ, Alaska taa nɛ pɩtɛ lɛ, paɖɩɣ Trans-Alaska tɛtɛɛ nʋmɔʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa sanzɩ tɩŋʋʋ yɔ miles waa 800.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Kabiyè]: Pɛlɩzɩkɩ hɔɔlɩŋ weyi ɩwɛ sɔnɔ yɔ, ɩɩkɛ Lukizɛmbuuri hɔɔlɩŋ caanaʋ taa,ɛlɛ ɩpɩsɩ Pɛlɩzɩkɩ ñɩŋ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ lʋba se kɩwɛɛ kɩ-tɩ yɔɔ pɩnzɩ 1830 waa taa nɛ pɩtɛ yɔ.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Kabiyè]: Kpaɣnɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ papaɣzɩ tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ Onion yɔ, ɖɩpɩsɩ hoŋa tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ sɔsɔyɛ siŋŋ, ɖɩwɛnɩ tɔm susuu takayaɣ hatʋ ñɩŋga, ɛntɛrnɛɛtɩ lone nɖɩ ɖɩhɔm ŋgee ɛyaa 5 000 000 Aloma fenaɣ taa, kɩ-tɛ adɖɛɛsɩ, tɔm susuu tʋmɩyɛ ɖʋtʋ ñɩɣtʋ 24 evemiye taa, podcast waa, nɛ pitileɖi yɔ, palɩzɩ ɛjaɖɛ aŋjaʋ atlas ŋgʋ payaɣ se Our Dumb World.
